articles.title: Brett James, songwriter of 'Jesus, Take The Wheel,' confirmed dead in plane crash - NBC News
articles.description: Brett James, the Grammy-winning writer of "Jesus, Take the Wheel" and scores of other hit country and pop songs, has died in a plane crash, authorities confirmed Friday morning.
articles.content:
